name: Fetch Customer Contact Details for a CIF Key

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000934860460000"

When I fetch the Customer Contact Details
| cifKey |
| 0100000934860460000 |

Then the following Customer Contact Details should be returned
| homeEmail | homeEmailUpdateDate | workEmail | workEmailUpdateDate | mobilePhonePrefix | mobilePhone | mobilePhoneUpdateDate | homePhonePrefix | homePhone | homePhoneUpdateDate | workPhonePrefix | workPhone | workPhoneUpdateDate | addressLine1 | addressLine2 | addressLine3 | addressLine4 | addressLine5 | addressUpdateDate | homeEmailConfirmDate | workEmailConfirmDate | mobilePhoneConfirmDate | workPhoneConfirmDate | homePhoneConfirmDate | homeEmailConfirmStaffID | workEmailConfirmStaffID | mobilePhoneConfirmStaffID | workPhoneConfirmStaffID | homePhoneConfirmStaffID | homeEmailUpdateStaffID | workEmailUpdateStaffID | mobilePhoneUpdateStaffID | workPhoneUpdateStaffID | homePhoneUpdateStaffID |
| MICKEYMOUSE@DISNEY.NET | 2015-09-14 |  | 2015-06-11 | 85 | 9663321 |  | 86 | 8343434 | 2015-06-11 |  |  |  | WORKFLOW SYSTEM TEST | BANKCENTRE | BALLSBRIDGE | DUBLIN 4 |  |  | 2015-06-11 | 2015-06-11 |  |  | 2015-06-11 | 88180 | 88180 |  |  | 88180 | 21356 | 88180 |  |  | 88180 |
